content: You will next receive a multiple-choice question, each with five options: A, B, C, D, and E respectively. Please provide your answer as a single letter option (your response should contain only one letter as the answer and no other text).

Question: The old style pop ups literally let you see the story when you did what?
Options: A. giggle B. visualize C. open book D. reading E. go to movies

The answer is D. reading. Old style pop ups were used to entice readers to continue reading and get the full story. This behavior fits the context of D. reading, as it suggests that readers would have been encouraged to read more by clicking on these pop ups.
